name: POF
description:
Help Pof shoot all nightmares away! Can you do it fast? Rules

This is a casual pixel art style shoot-em-up game. Help POF  kill all the monster nightmares as fast as possible and without loosing all your lives.  Every nightmare has its own behavior, so find the best strategy to defeat each one of them quickly. As you advance, you can buy new weapons and upgrade your stats, choose wisely to improve your times.

Don't forget to share your best times!

You can play this game online or you can download a standalone version for your operating system for free. If you like this game, please consider a donation when downloading! Credits

Game design, coding and music: Sergio R G  (Instagram: @srsergiorodriguez / Twitter: @srsergior)

Character design: Paula R G (Check her nice crochet amigurumis at @harucrochets)

Beta Testers: Miguel and Justin
